channel.title: Franklin County|Washington|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Franklin County|Washington|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: US-395 North - WA-260 Interchange
item.description: US-395 north approaching WA-260/Connell/Kahlotus.

item.title: US-395 North - WA-17 Interchange
item.description: US-395 North at WA-17 North to Mesa and Moses Lake.

item.title: I-182 East/US-12 East - Exits 14A and 14B
item.description: I-182 East/US-12 East at Exit 14A - WA-397 South/Finley/Oregon Ave. Exit 14B - US-395 North/Spokane. US-395 northbound leaves I-182/US-12 eastbound here.

item.title: I-182 East - Exit 14
item.description: I-182/US-12 East/US-395 North - Exit 14 - US-395 North/WA-397 South/Spokane/Finley. US-395 north leaves I-182/US-12 eastbound here.

item.title: US-395 North Approaching I-182/US-12
item.description: US-395 North approaching I-182 (West)/US-12 (West) to Spokane and Walla Walla. US-395 north joins US-12 and I-182 west briefly through Pasco.

item.title: US-395 North - Court St.
item.description: US-395 north approaching Court St. in Pasco.

item.title: US-395 North - Sylvester St.
item.description: US-395 North at Sylvester St. interchange in Pasco.

item.title: US-395 North - Entering Pasco and Franklin County
item.description: Entering Pasco and Franklin County (not signed) on US-395 north. Picture taken on the Blue Bridge over the Columbia River between Kennewick and Pasco.

item.title: WA-260 North Approaching WA-261 South
item.description: WA-260 North Approaching WA-261 South to Starbuck and US-12. WA-261 joins WA-260 north to Washtucna.

item.title: WA-260 South at WA-21 North
item.description: WA-260 South at WA-21 North to Lind in Kahlotus.

item.title: End WA-263 North at WA-260
item.description: End WA-263 North at WA-260 in Kahlotus. Turn right for WA-260 north to Washtucna; left for WA-260 south to Connell.

item.title: WA-263 North Approaching WA-260
item.description: WA-263 North approaching WA-260 to Connell and Washtucna in Kahlotus.

item.title: WA-263 North at Pasco Kahlotus Highway
item.description: WA-263 North at Pasco Kahlotus Highway in Franklin County. Turn left for Pasco Kahlotus Highway; right to continue north on WA-263 to Kahlotus.

item.title: WA-261 North at WA-260
item.description: WA-261 North at WA-260 in Franklin County. Turn right for WA-260/WA-261 North to Washtucna; left for WA-261 South to Kahlotus. WA-260 joins WA-261 north to Washtucna.

item.title: US-395 South Approaching WA-240 West
item.description: US-395 South approaching WA-240 West/Richland. Taken on the Blue Bridge over the Columbia River.

item.title: US-395 South - Columbia Drive
item.description: US-395 south approaching Columbia Drive/Port of Kennewick. Approaching the Blue Bridge over the Columbia River.

item.title: US-395 South - Approaching WA-240 West
item.description: US-395 South approaching WA-240 West/Richland in Pasco. Approaching the Blue Bridge over the Columbia River.

item.title: US-395 South - Court St.
item.description: US-395 South at Court St. interchange.

item.title: US-395 South - Court St.
item.description: US-395 South approaching Court St. interchange.

item.title: I-182/US-12 West/US-395 South - Exit 12A
item.description: I-182/US-12 West/US-395 South at Exit 12A - US-395 South/Kennewick/Pendleton (Oregon). US-395 south leaves I-182 here.

item.title: I-182/US-12 West/US-395 South - Exit 12A
item.description: I-182/US-12 West/US-395 South at Exit 12A - US-395 South/Kennewick/Pendleton (Oregon). Continue west on I-182/US-12 for Richland.

item.title: I-182/US-12 West/US-395 South - Exit 12A
item.description: I-182/US-12 West/US-395 South - Exit 12A - US-395 South/Kennewick/Pendleton (Oregon).

item.title: I-182/US-12 West/US-395 South - Exit 12B
item.description: I-182/US-12 West/US-395 South at Exit 12B - N 20th Ave.

item.title: I-182/US-12 West/US-395 South - Exit 13
item.description: I-182/US-12 West/US-395 South at Exit 13 - N 4th Ave./(Pasco)City Center.

item.title: US-395 South at I-182/US-12 - Pasco
item.description: US-395 South at I-182/US-12 in Pasco. Merge right to continue south on US-395, and I-182/Pendleton (Oregon)/Richland. US-395 south joins I-182 through Pasco.

item.title: US-395 South Approaching I-182/US-12
item.description: US-395 South approaching I-182/US-12 in Pasco. For Portland (Oregon), continue south on US-395.

item.title: US-395 South - I-182/US-12/WA-397 Jct.
item.description: US-395 South - I-182/US-12/WA-397 Jct. in Pasco. Continue on road south for WA-397 South to Finley. Merge right to continue south on US-395 and for I-182/US-12 West to Richland and Pendleton (Oregon). Use US-12 East for Walla Walla and Lewiston (Idaho).

item.title: US-395 South - Kartchner St.
item.description: US-395 South approaching Kartchner St. (Hillsboro Interchange).

item.title: US-395 South - Pasco Exits
item.description: Pasco Next 5 Exits on US-395 South

item.title: US-395 South - Eltopia
item.description: US-395 South approaching Eltopia junction.

item.title: End WA-17 South at US-395
item.description: End WA-17 South at US-395 in Franklin County. Use US-395 south for Pasco; US-395 north for Spokane.

item.title: WA-17 South Approaching WA-260
item.description: WA-17 south approaching WA-260 east to Connell and Washtucna.

item.title: WA-260 West/WA-261 South at Split
item.description: WA-260 West/WA-261 South at Split. Turn right to continue south on WA-261 to Little Goose Dam. Currently, the roadway across Little Goose Dam is closed. Little Goose Dam is located on the Snake River in Central Washington.

item.title: WA-260 West/WA-261 South Approaching WA-261
item.description: WA-260 West/WA-261 South approaching WA-261 in Franklin County.

item.title: WA-260 West/WA-261 South Approaching WA-261
item.description: WA-260 West/WA-261 South approaching WA-261. Turn left to continue south on WA-261 towards Starbuck and Walla Walla.

item.title: WA-260 West/WA-261 South - Franklin County
item.description: Entering Franklin County on WA-260 West/WA-261 south.

item.title: WA-397 North at I-182/US-12/US-395
item.description: WA-397 North at I-182/US-12/US-395 in Pasco. Merge right for US-12 East to Walla Walla and Lewiston (Idaho). Continue over freeway for I-182/US-12 East/US-395 South to Richland. Continue straight for US-395 north.
